DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy , safety pharmacokinetics multiple oral administration KUX-1151 patient hyperuricemia include gout .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Exploratory Clinical Study KUX-1151
DOC.criteria: Japanese HU patient ( Outpatient ) Patients meet follow criterion concern serum uric acid level screen [ 1 ) Gout : > 7.0 mg/dL , 2 ) HU complication : ≥ 8.0 mg/dL , 3 ) HU without complication : ≥ 9.0 mg/dL ] Patients symptom gouty arthritis within 2 week investigational product administration
